concepttext: Providing housing and creating value for the inhabitants of Yaoundé, Douala and beyond. Since 2001, we have been carrying out sustainable real estate projects with personalised support, advancing with expertise and transparency as a trusted real estate partner.
promomain: ‘Until 31 December 2025, SCI Hibiscus will cover 2% of the notary and land registry fees for eligible reservations.
promotext: Valable pour les 5 premières réservations sur les biens sélectionnés ci-dessous. Remise appliquée sur le prix d'achat affiché, hors frais de parking. SCI Hibiscus se réserve le droit de modification et de vente anticipée.
